benchmark_details.name: MedBench
benchmark_details.overview: A comprehensive benchmark for the Chinese medical domain, comprising 40,041 questions sourced from authentic examination exercises and medical reports of diverse branches of medicine.

purpose_and_intended_users.goal: To provide a standardized medical benchmark capable of offering reliable and authoritative evaluations for Chinese medical large language models.

data.source: Authentic medical examinations and real-world clinical cases from Chinese medical licensing and training.

methodology.calculation: Accuracy is calculated based on examination performances; BLEU and ROUGE used for real-world cases.
methodology.interpretation: Higher accuracy indicates better performance in responding correctly to medical examination questions.
methodology.validation: Extensive experiments conducted and detailed analyses performed.
